"Grrrrrr, you insult Sinnertwing" one head shrieks, as the dragon moves
forward, he stands on his hind legs, and whaps Blot with his front legs,
trying to pushing him. Normally Sinnertwins razor sharp claws would tear
through metal, but Blot's hide was very endurant, just like all the
Terrorcons.
